verses.verse: And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H452>Elijah<s%> had <S%H6213>done,<s%> and <S%H834>with<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>how<s%> he had <S%H2026>slain<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Then <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>So<s%> let the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to me, and <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H3541>also,<s%> if I <S%H7760>make<s%> not your <S%H5315>life<s%> as the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> of them by to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time.<s%>

And when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that, he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> for his <S%H5315>life,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belongs to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H5117>left<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

But he <S%H1931>himself<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> a <S%H3117>day's<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> down <S%H8478>under<s%> a <S%H7574>juniper<s%> tree: and he <S%H7592>requested<s%> for <S%H5315>himself<s%> that he might <S%H4191>die;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H7227>enough;<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> away my <S%H5315>life;<s%> for I am not <S%H2896>better<s%> than my <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And as he <S%H7901>lay<s%> and <S%H3462>slept<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> a <S%H7574>juniper<s%> tree, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> then an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H6965>Arise<s%> and <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And he <S%H5027>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H5692>cake<s%> baked on the <S%H7529>coals,<s%> and a <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> at his <S%H4763>head.<s%> And he did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>came<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, and <S%H5060>touched<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise<s%> and <S%H398>eat;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1870>journey<s%> is too <S%H7227>great<s%> for you.

And he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> in the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of that <S%H396>meat<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%> to <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> to a <S%H4631>cave,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to him, and he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> do you <S%H6311>here,<s%> <S%H452>Elijah?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I have been very <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> your <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H2040>thrown<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> your <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H2026>slain<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and I, even I <S%H905>only,<s%> am <S%H3498>left;<s%> and they <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life,<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> it away.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3318>Go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> on the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> by, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H6561>rent<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> in pieces the <S%H5553>rocks<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not in the <S%H7307>wind:<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> an <S%H7494>earthquake;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not in the <S%H7494>earthquake:<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> a <S%H784>fire;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not in the <S%H784>fire:<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> a <S%H1827>still<s%> <S%H1851>small<s%> <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

And it was so, when <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, that he <S%H3874>wrapped<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> in his <S%H155>mantle,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entering<s%> in of the <S%H4631>cave.<s%> And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H1961>came<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> do you <S%H6311>here,<s%> <S%H452>Elijah?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I have been very <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> your <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H2040>thrown<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> your <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H2026>slain<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and I, even I <S%H905>only,<s%> am <S%H3498>left;<s%> and they <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life,<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> it away.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> on your <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus:<s%> and when you <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H758>Syria:<s%>

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi<s%> shall you <S%H4886>anoint<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> of <S%H65>Abelmeholah<s%> shall you <S%H4886>anoint<s%> to be <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in your <S%H8478>room.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that him that <S%H4422>escapes<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> shall <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H4191>slay:<s%> and him that <S%H4422>escapes<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> shall <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H4191>slay.<s%>

Yet I have <S%H7604>left<s%> me <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have not <S%H3766>bowed<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has not <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

So he <S%H3212>departed<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8202>Shaphat,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was <S%H2790>plowing<s%> with <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of oxen <S%H6440>before<s%> him, and he with the <S%H8147>twelfth:<s%> <S%H6240><s%> and <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> by him, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> his <S%H155>mantle<s%> on him.

And he <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H5401>kiss<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H517>mother,<s%> and then I will <S%H3212>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> you. And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H7725>again:<s%> for <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> to you?

And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from him, and <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H2076>slew<s%> them, and <S%H1310>boiled<s%> their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they did <S%H398>eat.<s%> Then he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> and <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to him.
